sentences.english: Anyone suspected of suffering from silicosis must be shifted to lighter work.
sentences.chinese: 谁要是怀疑患有矽肺，必须调做较轻的工作。

sentences.english: ObjectiveIn our country, silicosis is the most serious vocational diseases that is harmful to workers.
sentences.chinese: 目的在我国，矽肺病是危害工人健康最严重的职业病。

sentences.english: Objective To approach the X-ray manifestations of silicosis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨矽肺的X线表现。

sentences.english: It is suggested that PVNO may inhibit the expression of collagen gene during silicosis.
sentences.chinese: 克矽平对矽肺进程中胶原基因表达的增强有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Authoritative does the hospital have name of hospital of good improvement ground and address to silicosis disease?
sentences.chinese: 有权威的医院对矽肺病有良好改善地医院名和地址吗？

sentences.english: He. Mr. He learned he had silicosis in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 何全贵在2004年得知自己患上了矽肺病。

sentences.english: Therefore, both methods are considered practicable in prejudging the t…
sentences.chinese: 由此可以认为两种方法均可用来预测矽肺的发展趋势。

sentences.english: Characterstics of pathogenesis of silicosis in uranium miners and its preventive measures are discussed on the basis of the experiments.
sentences.chinese: 根据实验结果，讨论了铀矿矽肺发病特点及防治措施。

sentences.english: The effects of lung lavage on the experimental silicosis of dogs were observed.
sentences.chinese: 对实验性狗矽肺使用肺灌洗术的作用进行了观察。

sentences.english: What's the longest word in the world besides pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis?
sentences.chinese: 除了“矽肺病”之外，世界上最长的单词是什么？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate long term therapeutic effect of combined anti fibrosis drugs on silicosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究矽肺抗纤维化治疗的远期疗效。

sentences.english: Silicosis increases the risk for lung carcinoma about 2 - fold.
sentences.chinese: 矽肺使肺癌的风险增加了2倍。

definition: silicosis (occupational disease of miners)/grinder's disease/also written 矽末病

pinyin: man4 xing4 zu3 se4 xing4 fei4 bing4

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
